Alvaro Alvites A quick search of our content on MIT OpenCourseWare (ocw.mit.edu) shows that 5.111, Fall 2008 (playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2902385153144A26) video lectures 28-30 and 5.112, Fall 2005 (playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB3953F4F875AB0B3) lectures 31-32 might have the information you need.
